title: Sekigahara Gassen: Kiro ni Tatta Tarui no Bushou-tachi

synonyms: The Battle of Sekigahara: The Warriors of Tarui Who Stood At the Crossroad
alternative_titles.ja: 関ヶ原合戦 岐路に立った垂井の武将たち

synopsis:
The anime short depicts the feelings of two warlords, Takenaka Shigekado and Tamehiro Hiratsuka, who were both comrades in the service of the Toyotomi family but became enemies during the Battle of Sekigahara. The anime focuses on the relationship the two men had with the famous military strategist Takenaka Shigeharu, who served as the advisor for Toyotomi Hideyoshi.

(Source: ANN)
